text: The AVN Award for Best Supporting Actress is an award that has been given by sex industry company AVN since the award ceremony's creation in 1984. As of January 2023, the titleholder is Kira Noir. ==Winners and nominees== ===1984-1989=== Year Photo Winner Nominees 1984 Tiffany Clark 1985 Lisa De Leeuw 1986 Lisa De Leeuw 1987 Colleen Brennan 1988
